title: Miles Davis - Get Up With It (1974)
description:

On the surface, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Get Up With ItÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, spanning 1970 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ 1974, looks like just a collection of outtakes. But the material here wouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have fit on any of the previous albums, yet here it pieces together like a jigsaw puzzle. It goes from ethereal to frantic to electrifying soloing. ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s even a blues tune. It ranges from funk to spooky ambience to driving jams, with extreme dedication to locating a very specific groove.

And of all the albums Miles Davis released then, the only one to capture the entire freewheeling sense of change and exploration is still Ã¢â‚¬Å“Get Up With ItÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½.

Miles Davis

Get Up With It

1974
  

 2 CDs / 2000 / Remastered / 320Kbps


Tracklist / Disc 1:

2. Maiysha (Columbia Studio E, New York, October 7, 1974)

Personnel includes:
